price: 108. Allí vivirán eternamente y nunca desearán abandonarlos por otro lugar.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
